comment._content: i wonder what street this is on Chimborazo BLVD?i cant even tell now?

comment.author: 61219637@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/57661266@N04] I think it is the Masjid Bilal at 400 Chimborazo Boulevard at the corner of Marshall Street.

comment.author: 39722514@N06
comment._content: I think it is Chimborazo at O Street. I looked up an old trolley map of Richmond and the only lines that crossed Chimborazo were Broad and Oakwood, but looking at this maps.google.com/maps?q=900+Chimborazo+Boulevard,+Richmond... photo, I'm almost positive this is the same viewpoint. Look at that tree! The branch off the main trunk on the left is identical.
